column2: "Mbrɛ ɔhyewber mu esukwankyɛba tse
column3: na mbrɛ otwaber mu nyankom tse no
column4: Mbrɛ enyidzi so mmfata ɔkwasea ara nye no."

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔsorɔm a orututu fɛm fɛm tse
column3: na mbrɛ akyemfowa a orututu tse no
column4: Mbrɛ duabɔ a onnyi ntseasee so nnkɛyɛ edwuma ara nye no."

column2: "Pɔnkɔbaa fata ɔpɔnkɔ
column3: menyiamfrɛ fata asoasopɔnkɔ
column4: Na abaa fata nkwasea hɔn ekyir."

column2: "Mma nnsusu ɔkwasea no nkwaseasɛm do mmbua no
column3: Amma wo so annyɛ dɛ ɔnoara."

column2: "Bua ɔkwasea wɔ no nkwaseasɛm ho
column3: Amma ɔannyɛ noara n'enyiwa do onyansafo."

column2: "Nyia ɔdze asɛm suma ɔkwasea no
column3: Otwitwa nankasa ne nan

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ apakye ne nan sensɛn hɔ no: Dɛmara so na abɛbusɛm tse wɔ ɔkwasea n'anomu."
"Mbrɛ aboɔdzembo kotoku a ɔhyɛ abo ntamu tse no
column3: Mbrɛ nyia ɔma ɔkwasea enyidzi tse so ara nye no."

column2: "Mbrɛ nsoɛ si kohwira sabokwanyi ne nsamu no
column3: Dɛmara so na abɛbusɛm tse wɔ nkwasea anomu."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ egyentofo pirapira nyimpa no
column3: Dɛmara na nyia ɔbɔ ɔkwasea paa na nyia ɔbɔ ɔkwantsemfo paa tse ara nye no."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ bɔdɔm san kɔ ne fe ho no
column3: Dɛmara na ɔkwasea si do yɛ no nkwaseadze ara nye no."

column2: "Ana ihu nyimpa a noara obu noho onyansafo? Ɔkwasea ho wɔ enyidado sen no."
"Ɔkwadwefo dɛ
column3: Ogyata wɔ ɔkwan mu: Ogyata wɔ abɔntsen do."

column2: "Mbrɛ abow twa noho apontsɛr do no
column3: Mbrɛ ɔkwadwefo so da ne mpa do ara nye no."

column2: "Ɔkwadwefo dze ne nsa nu nkwansɛn mu; Naaso haw n'enyi dɛ ɔdze bɛsan n'anomu bio."
"Ɔkwadwefo bu nankasa noho onyansafo Sen nyimpa beesuon a wotum kyerɛkyerɛ asɛm ase."
"Ɔkwantsennyi a ɔhaw noho wɔ aperper a ɔmmfa no ho mu no
column3: Ɔtse dɛ obi a osuo bɔdɔm n'asowa mu."

column2: "Mbrɛ ogyimfo a ɔtotow gyantsia
column3: Egyen menaba
column8: Ana nnyɛ agor na miridzi bi a

column2: "Enyena sa a
column3: ogya dum: Na bɔtomkɛka nnyi hɔ a

column2: "Mbrɛ biriw tse ma ogyansenama
column3: na enyena tse ma ogya no
column4: Mbrɛ ɔmansotwenyi sɔ aperper mu ogya ara nye no."

column2: "Bɔtomkɛkanyi ne nsɛm tse dɛ ntrɔma dɛɛdɛw
column3: Na osian kɔ yafun mpiatun no ho."

column2: "Ano hyeehyew na akoma bɔn Tse dɛ dɛtse kuraba a wɔdze dwetɛ dutu edura ho."
"Nyia ɔtan obi no
column3: ɔdze n'ano kata do

column2: "Sɛ ɔkasa dɛɛdɛw a
column3: mma nngye no nndzi; Na n'akoma mu wɔ ekyiwadze esuon."

column2: "Kaansa enyitan dze ndaadaa kata noho mpo a
column3: Wɔbɛda n'emumuyɛ no edzi akyerɛ mboanofo no petee."

column2: "Obiara a otu mona no
column3: ɔbɔtɔ mu ara: Na nyia opirepirew ɔbo no

column2: "Tɛkyerɛma torfo kyir hɔn a oepirapira hɔn no
column3: Na ndzɛfɛdzɛfɛw ano dze ɔsɛɛ ba."
